NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Destinations and Budget or the cell corresponding to Events and Urban?

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.49 to 0.62?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Destinations, Adventure), (Cruises, Budget), (Destinations, Budget), (Marketing, Budget), (Hotels, Business), (Hotels, Family), (Restaurants, Luxury), (Service Quality, Luxury), (Hotels, Rural), (Service Quality, Rural), (Attractions, Seasonal), (Hotels, Seasonal), (Service Quality, Wellness)}.
